titles.title: A bill to modify the provisions of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States relating to returned property.
A bill to modify the provisions of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States relating to returned property.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to modify the article description relating to the duty-free treatment of U.S. products returned after being exported to include products previously exported from the United States if returned within three years of being exported.
